itinerary.description: A trendy upscale spot known for its celebrity clientele and Californian-inspired cuisine, offering both indoor and outdoor seating.
itinerary.location: 113 N Robertson Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90048

itinerary.description: A popular open-air shopping and entertainment complex, perfect for strolling, with shopping, dining, and an iconic trolley.
itinerary.location: 189 The Grove Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90036

itinerary.description: A historic landmark with over 2,600 brass stars honoring the stars of the entertainment industry, perfect for a light stroll and photos.
A rooftop dining experience offering great views of the city with a menu of craft cocktails and upscale Californian fare.
